EmailTemplate.name: Trial Copy Test (InExperienced): May 2016.Day 14 - Email 8: Trial Ends Soon
EmailTemplate.subject: Set up your store before your trial ends
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You're so close — quickly launch your online store. Pick a plan that's right for you.
Log in to your control panel <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login]]>
Your free trial ends soon
Set up your store
Select your plan Don't lose your store
We noticed that you haven't launched your online store yet. You can set it up and open for business in just a few easy steps by logging in now.
Or select a subscription plan and get the time you need to finish building your store.
Select your plan » <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login]]>
